docs.title: linkml-tutorial
docs.text:
Learning how to use LinkML

URI: https://w3id.org/tkphd/linkml-tutorial Name: linkml-tutorial

docs.title: Classes
docs.text: Class Description Animal A specific animal AnimalCollection A group of animals NamedThing A generic entity that has its own name Person A specific person PersonCollection A group of people

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Slot Description age_in_years Number of trips around the sun experienced by an individual animals A collection of animals that live with a person birth_date Date on which an individual was born breed Characteristic or strain or subspecies or variant color Characteristic exterior color of an animal entities A collection of people household_members A list of cohabitating creatures id Unique identifier for the individual name Proper noun referring to the object pets A group of companion animals primary_email Primary address for electronic mail species Taxonomic species of an animal vital_status Alive or Dead? weight_in_mgs Weight of an animal, measured in milligrams

docs.title: Enumerations
docs.text: Enumeration Description Breeds Collection of known breeds PersonStatus Vital status of a person

docs.title: Types
docs.text: Type Description Boolean A binary (true or false) value Date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime Datetime The combination of a date and time Decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... Double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification Float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification Integer An integer Ncname Prefix part of CURIE Nodeidentifier A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model Objectidentifier A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model String A character string Time A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... Uri a complete URI Uriorcurie a URI or a CURIE

docs.text: Subset Description

docs.title: Class: Animal
docs.text:
A specific animal

URI: TUT:Animal

 classDiagram
    class Animal
      NamedThing <|-- Animal

      Animal : age_in_years
        Animal <.. integer : age_in_years
      Animal : birth_date
        Animal <.. date : birth_date
      Animal : breed
        Animal <.. uriorcurie : breed
      Animal : color
        Animal <.. string : color
      Animal : id
        Animal <.. uriorcurie : id
      Animal : name
        Animal <.. string : name
      Animal : species
        Animal <.. uriorcurie : species
      Animal : weight_in_mgs
        Animal <.. integer : weight_in_mgs

docs.title: Inheritance
docs.text:
• NamedThing
    • Animal

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Name Cardinality and Range Description Inheritance species 0..1  Uriorcurie Taxonomic species of an animal direct breed 0..1  Uriorcurie Characteristic or strain or subspecies or variant direct color 0..1  String Characteristic exterior color of an animal direct weight_in_mgs 0..1  Integer Weight of an animal, measured in milligrams direct id 1..1  Uriorcurie Unique identifier for the individual NamedThing age_in_years 0..1  Integer Number of trips around the sun experienced by an individual NamedThing birth_date 0..1  Date Date on which an individual was born NamedThing name 0..1  String Proper noun referring to the object NamedThing

docs.text: used by used in type used AnimalCollection animals range Animal

docs.text: • pet

docs.text: • from schema: https://w3id.org/tkphd/linkml-tutorial

docs.text: Mapping Type Mapped Value self TUT:Animal native TUT:Animal exact BIO:Animal, NCIT:C14182, wd:Q729 narrow FOODON:00003004

docs.title: Direct
docs.text:
name: Animal
description: A specific animal
from_schema: https://w3id.org/tkphd/linkml-tutorial
aliases:
- pet
exact_mappings:
- BIO:Animal
- NCIT:C14182
- wd:Q729
narrow_mappings:
- FOODON:00003004
rank: 1000
is_a: NamedThing
slots:
- species
- breed
- color
- weight_in_mgs
unique_keys:
  main:
    unique_key_name: main
    unique_key_slots:
    - name
    - birth_date
    description: An animal can be uniquely specified by its name and birthdate.
rules:
- postconditions:
    description: At least one of Species or Breed should be populated.
    any_of:
    - slot_conditions:
        breed:
          name: breed
          required: true
    - slot_conditions:
        species:
          name: species
          required: true

    - Animal

docs.title: Class: NamedThing
docs.text:
A generic entity that has its own name

  • NOTE: this is an abstract class and should not be instantiated directly

 classDiagram
    class NamedThing
      NamedThing <|-- Person
      NamedThing <|-- Animal

      NamedThing : age_in_years
        NamedThing <.. integer : age_in_years
      NamedThing : birth_date

      NamedThing : id
        NamedThing <.. uriorcurie : id
      NamedThing : name
        NamedThing <.. string : name

docs.title: Class: Person
docs.text:
A specific person

URI: schema:Person

 classDiagram
    class Person
      NamedThing <|-- Person

      Person : age_in_years
        Person <.. integer : age_in_years
      Person : birth_date
        Person <.. date : birth_date
      Person : id
        Person <.. uriorcurie : id
      Person : name
        Person <.. string : name
      Person : pets
        Person <.. AnimalCollection : pets
      Person : primary_email
        Person <.. string : primary_email
      Person : vital_status
        Person <.. PersonStatus : vital_status

docs.title: Inheritance
docs.text:
• NamedThing
    • Person

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Name Cardinality and Range Description Inheritance primary_email 0..1  String Primary address for electronic mail direct vital_status 1..1  PersonStatus Alive or Dead? direct pets 0..1  AnimalCollection A group of companion animals direct id 1..1  Uriorcurie This is a unique identifier for a person NamedThing age_in_years 0..1  Integer Number of trips around the sun experienced by an individual NamedThing birth_date 0..1  Date Date on which an individual was born NamedThing name 0..1  String Proper noun referring to the object NamedThing

docs.title: Usages
docs.text: used by used in type used PersonCollection entities range Person

docs.title: Valid ID Prefixes
docs.text:
Instances of this class should have identifiers with one of the following prefixes:

  • orcid

  • wd

docs.title: Enum: PersonStatus
docs.text:
Vital status of a person

URI: PersonStatus

docs.title: Permissible Values
docs.text: Value Meaning Description alive PATO:0001421 The person is alive dead PATO:0001422 The person is deceased unknown None The vital status of this person is unknown

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Name Description vital_status Alive or Dead?

docs.title: Schema Source
docs.text: • from schema: https://w3id.org/tkphd/linkml-tutorial

docs.title: LinkML Source
docs.text:
name: PersonStatus
description: Vital status of a person
from_schema: https://w3id.org/tkphd/linkml-tutorial
rank: 1000
permissible_values:
  alive:
    text: alive
    description: The person is alive
    meaning: PATO:0001421
  dead:
    text: dead
    description: The person is deceased
    meaning: PATO:0001422
  unknown:
    text: unknown
    description: The vital status of this person is unknown
